title: David Harbour hams it up as Lily Allen romance goes from strength to strength
text:
These lovebirds (Picture: Splash)

Lily Allen’s romance with Stranger Things star David Harbour seems to be going from strength to strength, as the pair continue to jet between their home cities of New York and London to see each other.

Lily and David were pictured on Monday enjoying a stroll through New York, with Lily wrapping up warm in a long overcoat and oversized sunglasses while David kept it cool in a baseball cap and a copy of Celeste Ng’s Little Fires Everywhere.

Those disguises couldn’t fool the photographers though, and David decided to make the best of the situation by acting the fool.

In early October we weren’t even sure if Lily Allen and David Harbour were legit a thing but since then, the pair have been cramming in every celebrity couple milestone.

Lily and David were pictured on Monday enjoying a stroll through New York (Picture: Splash)

Lily supporting the actor at Saturday Night Live? Check.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Plenty of PDA on the streets of New York? Check.

Social media boasts? Yep, check.

Walking their first red carpet together? Check.

Those disguises couldn’t fool the photographers though (Picture: Splash)

Lily accompanied 44-year-old actor to the Skin Cancer Foundation’s Champagne for Change gala at New York’s swanky Plaza Hotel, and while they weren’t holding hands or tangling tongues for the cameras, it’s clear this romance is blossoming.

Lily, who has two daughters from her marriage to Sam Cooper, had been single since splitting from boyfriend of three years Meridian Dan, while David is believed to have split from Fantastic Beasts actress Alison Sudol earlier this year.

We first wondered what was going on between Lily and David back in August (Picture: Splash)

We first wondered what was going on between Lily and David back in August, when the unlikely pals were seen leaving a London theatre together.

Things stepped up a notch when the pair were seen enjoying the Hughie Fury vs Alexander Povetkin boxing match at the O2 Arena, and every time we’ve seen them they’ve seemed smitten with each other.

Young love, hey?
